entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 2:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Snow inland late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow inland in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
